attributes.action: license all cycles and make them have insurance, lights and a m.o.t.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ALL CAR DRIVERS MUST PAY FOR INSURANCE, TAX AND M.O.T TO USE THE ROADS YET CYCLES IN ANY STATE CAN RIDE ON ROADS CAUSING DANGER AND ACCIDENTS WITHOUT PAYING A PENNY. SOME EVEN RIDE WITHOUT LIGHTS OR ON THE PAVEMENT.IF A CAR HITS A BIKE WHO GETS THE BLAME AND COSTS? THE CAR DRIVER OR THE CYCLIST, I THINK WE KNOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
